message.content:
cs.ET, cs.AR, cs.NE, cs.EM, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
- cs.ET (Emerging Technologies): The paper discusses the use of resistive memory-based cross-bar arrays, which can be considered an emerging technology in the field of deep learning hardware.
- cs.AR (Hardware Architecture): The paper focuses on the architecture of the cross-bar array and proposes hardware optimizations to minimize catastrophic failures.
- cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing): The paper discusses the impact of initialization failures on the performance of deep neural networks and proposes a solution to improve resilience.
- cs.EM (Electromagnetism): The paper discusses the non-idealities of the cross-bar array, which can be related to the electromagnetic properties of the resistive memory elements.
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper proposes a hardware and software co-optimization procedure to cope with initialization failures, which can be considered a control problem.
